rules_text:
Menace
[i]Renewed Purpose[/i] – Whenever a creature you control enters from a graveyard, it gains haste until end of turn. It must attack the opponent with the most life among your opponents this turn if able.
[i]Ífingr[/i] – {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Each opponent sacrifices a creature. For each player who couldn't, return a creature card from your graveyard to the battlefield.
